item.title: Need help fixing this dupe
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

[quote=“breadthat1, post:4, topic:452119”]save has nothing to do with this dupe you just have to force log out i removed save long ago…
and wene u force log out the server dont catch the player that he deregistered and it saves before drop.[/quote]

“save has nothing to do with this dupe”

Read full topic

item.title: Need help fixing this dupe
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Gravity pk, post:6, topic:452119”][quote author=KempiScape link=topic=554998.msg4064014#msg4064014 date=1343694472]

easy, go to DropItem.java in your source. and look for this code

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());
c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]);
c.SaveGame();
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This item cannot be dropped.”);
}
}

it wont have the “c.SaveGame();” in it thats in green, you have to add that under that line, thats it

Thats a fix, though it can affect server speed
[/quote]

actually, i just fixed this dupe yesterday on my own rsps. so try it before u assume it doesn’t work. be nice someone actually took their time to help u. i bet u 200$ it will work.[/quote]
He said nothing about it not working. He just said it may affect server speed.

Read full topic
